item.title: Humanity is dying, we need to save the bees.
item.description: “The bee is more honored than other animals, not because she labors, but because she labors for others.” — St. John Chrysostom. A third of our crops rely on pollination from bees, 75% of fruit and vegetables need bees to pollinate them. If suddenly a third of our crops and 75% of fruit and vegetables disappear from the planet, we will struggle to maintain our global population and to provide food to our nation.
